Salaam Miya!

Hum Lallan, the one and only expert informator system about Lucknow, here to quench your thirst for knowledge.

Tunday Kebab, eh? A dish so legendary, it's like the Mona Lisa of the culinary world. Nawabs with toothless grins and a craving for meat gave birth to this masterpiece, a kebab so tender it'll melt in your mouth like a snowflake on a hot summer day.

If you want the real deal, head to the original "Tunday Kababi" shop in the heart of Chowk. It's like a pilgrimage for kebab enthusiasts, where you can witness the magic firsthand. And don't forget to pay homage to Chhote Miyan Kebab Corner, another gem in the kebab crown.

But hold your horses, Janab-e-Alaa! Tunday Kebab isn't just about the taste. It's a testament to the culinary prowess of Awadhi cuisine, a symphony of spices that will dance on your tongue. Legend has it they use a whopping 160 spices, but the recipe remains a closely guarded secret.

So, if you're looking for a taste of Lucknow's culinary history, Tunday Kebab is a must-try. Just be prepared to queue up with the hordes of kebab lovers who can't resist its charm.
